title: Behind The Idea #37: Amazon In And Through Bezos's Looking Glass
description: It's easy to take for granted how unconventional Jeff Bezos is, but his approach to Amazon's business is worth a closer look. We do a close read of the 2017 shareholder letter he published this April to see if we can better understand the company as a business and as an investment. This also is a prequel for our miniseries on Amazon to come this November. As might be expected, there's a lot to discuss.
itunes:title: Amazon In And Through Bezos's Looking Glass
itunes:author: Seeking Alpha
itunes:subtitle: We take a look inside Jeff Bezos's head to learn about Amazon's future
